data.name: Saturday of Piercing Screams
data.detailed_description:
Vanquish your foes with bricks, your own weight or bombs.

The Plot

Become hero of the 1917 revolution in Russia! Pioneers of the Fist occupied the Castle Samozbor. You are the best liquidator Red Army does have.
Your task is to crush the members of counter-revolution and escape your doom.

Saturday of Piercing Screams features:

  • Legendary cursed infinite-spanning castle
  • 64 levels
  • Destructible environment
  • 914 pioneers
  • Flexing between levels
  • Enduring but simple gameplay

data.short_description: Enemy made the cursed infinite-spanning castle Samozbor as their base. You are best liquidator in the world. Can you survive the ordeals of that forbidden dimension and come home alive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 320m
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains violence, blood and gore.
